title: Breathtaking Artist Loft with Great Design - Northern Liberties
description:
Available early April:
Welcome to 109 W Wildey St #111 at the Schoolhouse Lofts! The Schoolhouse Lofts are a community of modern-industrial artist lofts inside the historic Daniel Boone School located at the cross-section of Fishtown and Northern Liberties area of Philadelphia. This beautiful, late gothic revival building was classically known as the Philadelphia school for the rebellious. This building brings a unique mix of old and new with trendy design elements like minimalistic lighting fixtures, exposed beams, original brick work, and fantastically intricate original details. This leading boutique building offers modern conveniences for modern living. The public spaces such as the elevator, mailroom, and multiple laundry rooms are custom engineered to minimize stress and maximize well-being. Unit #111 is a fantastic studio apartment, offering high ceilings, huge windows, 3 closets for great storage space, and a bright and airy atmosphere. You enter the unit into a hallway with hardwood floors and exposed beams that continue throughout the entire space. There is a kitchen to the left with tile backsplash, granite countertops, great cabinetry for storage, and a full set of stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, microwave, oven/stove, and refrigerator. This large unit offers space for a living/dining area in front of the kitchen by the 4 giant windows – perfect for your plants! A black divider offers privacy for a bed towards the back left of the apartment. Your bathroom offers a medicine cabinet, vanity, and shower/tub combo. All units have Central A/C! FREE laundry in laundry rooms located on the 1st, 2nd, and Penthouse floors of the building. Schedule a showing today!

description:

Welcome to 2610 Cedar St! This lovely 2 bedroom / 2 bathroom row home is situated on the end of the row with a private full lot side-yard complete with a flower garden, a wooden deck, and a patio with room for entertaining! Enter the home into the living area with large windows at the front for natural sunlight and a ceiling fan for year-round comfort. The straight back floor plan flows back past the dining area with room for a large table. The kitchen is separated by a breakfast bar with seating for two, and has an abundance of cabinet and counter space. There’s a window over the sink, white subway tile backsplash, a stainless steel gas range, garbage disposal, microwave, and refrigerator. Head upstairs to view two bedrooms with wall-to-wall carpeting and good closet space. The front bedroom is about twice the size of the other and features a ceiling fan and tons of natural light! Your full bathroom on this level boasts tile flooring and along the walls, a vanity, and a tiled shower / tub combo. There is also a finished basement with additional living space which would work great as an office or den. In the basement you can also find a washer / dryer for ultimate convenience and another full bathroom. The backyard space is the entire lot next door and comes with a storage shed for tenant usage. This great space won’t last long – schedule a showing today!

title: 1100 sqft 2-bed, 2-bath apartment, no deposit and 8th month free
description:
You pay for 7 months, I pay the 8th month and I pay your security deposit.
You need to pay $75 application fee and provide proof of income minimum $6,300 per month for the household.
325 Meadowbrook Dr, Huntingdon Valley, PA 19006
near
1700 Huntingdon Pike, Huntingdon Valley, PA 19006
My loss is your gain. I must move out of state immediately and need somebody to take over my lease. I am giving you almost a full month of free rent and paying your security deposit.
This place has no weight restrictions on cats or dogs of all sizes but aggressive breeds restricted (refer to leasing office for more info). No more than 2 pets (either 1 cat and 1 dog, or 2 cats, or 2 dogs).
For rent is a 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment. About 1100 square feet. All hardwood floor except the 2 bedrooms, which are carpet.
The master bedroom is about 13 feet by 16 feet not including the walk in closet or full bathroom.
The second bedroom is about 10 feet by 14 feet not including the closet.
Clothing washer and dryer included. Automatic dishwasher included. The stove top is a ceramic cooktop. Has an oven and a broiler.
You are getting almost a full month free and keep my security deposit when you move out if you take over my lease with about 8 months left on it. If you want a longer lease, you can choose a longer term than 8 months and your rent will go down. For example, the rent is currently $2,095 per month, but if you choose a 16-month lease, it will go down to $2,025.
You are essentially paying for the last 7 months of my lease but staying here for 8 months, plus getting back my security deposit if the leasing office decides to return it. Not up to me, up to them.
All applicants must be able to provide proof of income to the leasing office. Combined household income of all applicants must be equal to or greater than $6,300 per month. Proof of income must be a PDF from your payroll provider or your banking website.
You need to pay a $75 application fee to the leasing office and specify it is for unit #325. They accept credit card as a form of payment.
You need three recent pay stubs from your current employer, or proof of retirement income, or proof of govt payments (disability, social security) or proof of court ordered alimony or child support payments.
I have paid the rent up until May 01, 2022. You will be responsible for the rent from May 01 until the move out date, approximately 10 months from February 8th. I think that would be November 8th.
I have already paid the security deposit, and I do not need it back.
If you want to see the corporate web site, check it out here but don't apply here without communicating with me, first https://comehometomeadowbrook.com/
More than ample parking available in this gated community for you and all your guests right outside your door.
One neighbor has a Doberman Pinscher, another has a malamute. Neither has ever made a sound. This place allows dogs of all sizes.
The heat works excellent, but I hardly used it. Without running the heat at all, the master bedroom was about 58 degrees in the winter, the kitchen was about 65 degrees. I joked my neighbor's heat is probably warming my place up. The coldest months are behind you.
Pet fee is $300 non-refundable fee. There is an additional $35 per month pet rent for up to 2 pets.
You are required to have a weird insurance. The leasing office recommends Lemonade as the insurance company, so I used them. My insurance was $10 per month and was more than the minimum the leasing office required. I think the minimum would have been $8.50 per month.
I pay $45 per month for 300 mbps, the most affordable plan. 1200 mpbs is available, maybe $70 per month? Not sure. Only one internet provider is available, Xfinity.
All utilities other than internet are paid online with the rent to Lindy Corp.
Amenities include:
Washer and dryer
dishwasher
central heating and air
refrigerator
microwave
Dog Park and Dog Wash
Community Garden
Barber shop on site
playground
olympic sized swimming pool
Fitness center (free on-site gym)
Free weights
Pool table
Tennis Court
High Speed internet (I pay $45 per month for 300 mbps
Pay rent online
24-hour emergency maintenance
The only damage right now is where a 1-inch circle of paint is missing when I removed a command sticky hook from the wall. I can provide photos from when I moved in of existing damages, such as a scuff on the kitchen floor. You will be responsible for any damages beyond my deposit, or you can have the remainder of my deposit when you move out. You are responsible for my portion of unpaid utilities, which were minimal. I am 1 person, was rarely home, never used the stove or oven or broiler, just the microwave but usually ate out at restaurants, fast food, or with friends who can cook.

title: This trinity-style home is cute
description:
This trinity-style home is cute as a button. Located on a quaint quiet street in the Washington Square neighborhood, this 2 bedroom 1 bathroom home has character and charm. When you enter the home you are greeted by a living space that has windows on both sides, a working gas fireplace, access to the private patio, and a coat closet. Follow the spiral stairs down a level to the kitchen. This kitchen has all the necessary appliances including a washer & dryer in the closet next to the fridge.
Follow the stairs up one more level to the main bedroom. This encompasses the full floor. Windows on both sides let in lots of natural light, the ceiling fan helps with circulating the central heat and air, there are two closets on this floor and plenty of room for your bed, dresser, and nightstands. The patio outside allows for a grill, a small table and chairs, and your green thumb if you have one. The alley next to the home is gated and locked. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

title: this 1-bedroom apartment sits in a beautiful brownstone
description:
Located in the heart of the city on one of Rittenhouse's most charming blocks, this 1-bedroom apartment sits in a beautiful brownstone with unique historic details and hardwood floors throughout. This spacious 1-bedroom includes a large main room with a separate kitchen area, and then another room with a washer & dryer that could potentially be used as an office. The kitchen receives plenty of natural light and has plenty of cabinet/drawer space, complete with a dishwasher, garbage disposal and adorable breakfast bar. With plenty of closet space and a full bathroom, this apartment is perfect for a couple or one person to live very comfortably! Water and gas are included, tenants are only responsible for electricity. Enjoy living in this gorgeous neighborhood and being within walking distance to Rittenhouse Square and all that Center City has to offer - local markets including the farmer's market, excellent restaurants and bars, cafes and coffee shops, easy access to public transportation, plus nearby highway access for a quick commute in and out of the city. title: Chic 3 BR 3.5 Bath Home in Fishtown with 2 Car Parking
description:
Chic 3 BR 3.5 Bath Home in Fishtown with 2 Car Parking! The 1st fl features 10 ft ceilings, a state of the art kitchen with 42" white shaker style cabinets, Quartz counters, GE Profile appliances, glass backsplash and a large center island with waterfall edge, a spacious family room and a separate dining area with beautiful custom antique wine rack. The 2nd floor features 2 large bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms and an ideally situated laundry room with cabinetry. The 3rd floor features a Primary Suite which feels like a private retreat with a Juliet balcony that has motorized shades and drapery, a generous walk-in closet with custom shelving, an extra sitting area and a spa-like master bath with a large, walk-in glass enclosed shower with bench and dual shower heads, a double sink vanity, a spacious linen closet and water closet. The finished lower level with 9'+ ceilings, built-in storage cabinetry and a powder room is the perfect space for a media room, home office, gym; the options are endless. The roof deck offers amazing views of the skyline, bridge and river and features an oversized outdoor sectional and retractable umbrella for lazy weekends and entertaining alike. The house also features custom louvered shades throughout. With 2-CAR PARKING, high ceilings, dual zoned HVAC, tankless hot water heater (new in 2020), lots of sunlight, large windows, 5" oak hardwood floors finished on site, glass railings, this home is not to be missed. A short walk to Johnny Brenda's, La Colombe, Pizzeria Beddia, Wm. Mulherin's Sons, The Fillmore, and all Fishtown has to offer. With easy access to the 95 corridor, the El Stop, and two blocks from Penn Treaty Park and the Delaware waterfront, this is the ideal location to call home.

title: Leasing Special: Amazing 2BD Home w. Basement & Fireplace
description:
Welcome to 777 S 3rd St #D! This 2 bedroom / 1 bathroom trinity townhouse features exposed wood rafters, a working fireplace, hardwood floors, and unique architecture throughout the space. Enter on the first floor with a great living area offering custom built-in shelving and a large window for natural light. Your rustic kitchen is located on the lower level of the home. Kitchen features include tile flooring, wood cabinetry, under-cabinet lighting, and appliances including dishwasher, gas range, refrigerator, and in-unit laundry. Head upstairs to the second floor to view your first bedroom with a window and closet space. Your full bathroom is also on this floor with tile flooring, shower/tub combo, vanity, and overhead cabinets for additional storage space. The upper-level loft boasts a working fireplace, great natural light, high ceilings with exposed wood rafters, and access to a balcony that overlooks the lovely side street below. Please note: lower level kitchen ceiling is low, approximately 6-foot clearance. Schedule your tour today!

title: Beautiful 2 Bedroom 2 Bathroom Apartment Home, City View, Gym, Sauna
description:
The home at 1902 is a 1,185 square foot Da Vinci two bedroom two bathroom apartment home in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! This home on the 19th floor has windows that face east for morning sunshine and afternoon shade and have a city view. The beautiful kitchen and bathrooms are definitely a must see! There is also abundant closet space for plenty of storage. Experience the convenience of having a combination washer and dryer inside your new home! Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores and restaurants! Target, Giant, Trader Joe's, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, and Di Bruno Bros. are grocery stores within walking distance! Shop at the retail stores of Rittenhouse Row such as Barnes & Noble, Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, Shakespeare & Co., Paper Source, L'Occitane, Boyds, Banana Republic Factory, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Devon Seafood Grill, a.bar, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, Via Locusta, The Love, Marathon Grill, Gran Caffe L'Aquila, and Alice Pizza. Sip a delicious coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, Elixr, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in a beautiful French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Stroll across the park and then buy a loaf of artisanal bread from Metropolitan Bakery.
Community Features:
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Top-of-the-line fitness center
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Sauna
* Package room
* Bike storage
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Laundry room on every floor
* Large laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Combination washer and dryer
* Spacious closets
* Large east-facing windows
* City view
* Wood floors
* Renovated kitchen
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen counters
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Beautiful bathrooms with Italian tile
* Spacious home
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)

Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets.
